title: Numbered Memory Convention
content:
The Numbered Memory Convention organizes knowledge by priority for efficient loading and retrieval.

Number ranges:
- 00-09: Core system memories (loaded first if context breaks)
- 10-99: Primary operational memories
- 100-199: Standards and procedures
- 200-299: Project-specific information
- 300-399: Tools and documentation
- 1000+: Specialized conceptual frameworks

This allows the orchestrator to load exactly what is needed based on task type, maintaining focused context while ensuring critical knowledge is always accessible.
summary: Numbering system for knowledge priority and retrieval
